---
title: Final Documentation Review
---

Now that you have your documentation ready for review, please run through the following list before you open a PR.

:::{.callout-note}
Some of the items may not be applicable.
:::


- Did I follow the [Template/Outline](/templates/section-outline.qmd)?
- Did I remove outdated information?
- Did I add information in other places, if applicable?
- Verify Terminology & References  & Connect UI Naming Conventions
- Did I follow the [Documentation Style Guide](/writing/style-guide.qmd)
  - Additionally, review the entire file that you are working on and make standardization updates referencing the Style Guide.
- Did I run through all of the steps and verify that they’re accurate?
- Test for broken links
- Open PR 

PR → PR Approval → Merge!
